changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT property_value FROM global_property WHERE property = 'ugandaemr.maximumPatientsPerDay'

changeSet.comment: Reset maximum patients per day value to blank which is unlimited
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = '' WHERE property = 'ugandaemr.maximumPatientsPerDay'

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Fix bad data for the ART care section which is causing an error when saving the summary page
changeSet.sql: UPDATE obs SET value_numeric = NULL WHERE concept_id = 99162 AND value_numeric IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Correct the sticky note concept
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'CIEL:162169' WHERE property = 'coreapps.conceptStickyNote';

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Move the death information from the obs table to the person table
changeSet.sql: UPDATE person INNER JOIN obs ON obs.person_id = person.person_id AND concept_id = 99112 AND value_coded = 90003 SET dead = 1; UPDATE person INNER JOIN obs ON obs.person_id = person.person_id AND concept_id = 90272 SET death_date = value_datetime;

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(form_id) FROM form WHERE form_id = 14

changeSet.comment: Move all summary pages from form_id 34 to 14
changeSet.sql: UPDATE encounter SET form_id = 14 WHERE form_id = 34

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Delete obs without concepts from previous migrations
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM obs WHERE concept_id IN (SELECT c.concept_id FROM concept c WHERE c.datatype_id = 2) AND value_coded IS NULL

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Delete corrupted metadata mapping terms from xstream 2.07 and lower for Encounter Types
changeSet.sql: UPDATE metadatamapping_metadata_term_mapping SET metadata_class = 'org.openmrs.EncounterType' WHERE metadata_class = 'org.openmrs.EncounterType_$$_jvstbd5_23'

changeSet.author: solemabrothers

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE uuid = '415b8d70-6b45-41d8-a0ba-41b1a6b8aa1f'

changeSet.comment: Clear the tasks named aijar
changeSet.sql: Delete from liquibasechangelog where ID in ('ugandaemr-06232017-1639','ugandaemr-06232017-1638','ugandaemr-06232017-1637','uganademr-10202017-2138','551c4d8d-8d33-4bcf-bee7-5aeeadc47775','ugandaemr-2019-16-16-1425');

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.ugandaemr.tasks.LinkExposedInfantToMotherTask'

changeSet.comment: Inserting Exposed Infant Link to Mother Task into 'schedule_task_config' table
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config where uuid='29584cdf-37c0-46ec-b942-3b98274e30d8'

column.name: name
column.value: Link infants to mothers via ART Number

column.name: description
column.value: Links exposed infants to mothers through their ART numbers

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.ugandaemr.tasks.ExitTBProgramASLostToFollowUpTask'

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config where uuid='415b8d70-6b45-41d8-a0ba-41b1a6b8aa1f'
changeSet.comment: Inserting TB Lost to Followup Exit Task into 'schedule_task_config' table

column.name: name
column.value: TB Lost to Followup Exit Task

column.name: description
column.value: Exits patients from the TB program who have not come for 90 days

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.ugandaemr.tasks.ExitMCHProgramASLostToFollowUpTask'

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config where uuid='d1147982-1fd3-4d03-8b6c-6345a8187b28'
changeSet.comment: Inserting MCH Lost to Followup Exit Task into 'schedule_task_config' table

column.name: name
column.value: MCH Lost to Followup Exit Task

column.name: description
column.value: Exits mothers from the MCH program who have not come for 90 days

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Stop scheduled tasks that are not used from starting up
changeSet.sql: UPDATE scheduler_task_config SET start_on_startup = 0 WHERE schedulable_class IN ('org.openmrs.module.formentry.ProcessFormEntryQueueTask', 'org.openmrs.scheduler.tasks.ProcessHL7InQueueTask')

changeSet.author: slubwama
changeSet.comment: Change concept 162394 datatype to coded concept
changeSet.sql: UPDATE concept SET datatype_id = 2 WHERE concept_id = 162394

changeSet.author: slubwama
changeSet.comment: Change birth weight concept 5916 attribute allow decimals to yes
changeSet.sql: UPDATE concept_numeric SET allow_decimal = 1 WHERE concept_id = 5916

changeSet.author: carapai
changeSet.comment: Migrate obs date time to viral load date concept
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO obs (person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, order_id, obs_datetime, location_id, obs_group_id, accession_number, value_group_id, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, value_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, value_complex, comments, creator, date_created, voided, voided_by, date_voided, void_reason, uuid, previous_version, form_namespace_and_path) SELECT person_id, 163023, encounter_id, order_id, obs_datetime, location_id, obs_group_id, accession_number, value_group_id, value_coded, value_coded_name_id, value_drug, obs_datetime, value_numeric, value_modifier, value_text, value_complex, comments, creator, date_created, voided, voided_by, date_voided, void_reason, uuid(), previous_version, form_namespace_and_path FROM obs WHERE concept_id = 856 AND obs_id NOT IN (SELECT A.obs_id FROM (SELECT * FROM obs WHERE concept_id = 856) A INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM obs WHERE concept_id = 163023) B ON (A.encounter_id = B.encounter_id));

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE schedulable_class = 'org.openmrs.module.ugandaemr.tasks.ExitMCHProgramASLostToFollowUpTask'

changeSet.comment: Change column to utf8 to enable saving of multi-byte characters
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `serialized_object` MODIFY `serialized_data` MEDIUMTEXT CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: ssmusoke
changeSet.comment: Delete any blank person attribute values from previous upgrades which prevents editing of patient
changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM person_attribute WHERE value IS NULL OR value = '';

changeSet.author: slubwama

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(program_id) FROM program WHERE program.uuid = 'de5d54ae-c304-11e8-9ad0-529269fb1459';
SELECT count(id) FROM liquibasechangelog WHERE id="ugandaemr-01-10-2018-1200";

changeSet.comment: Move all Patients Ever enrolled in Facility Based Individual Management DSDM
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO patient_program (patient_id, program_id, date_enrolled, location_id, creator, date_created, voided, uuid) SELECT patient_id,(SELECT program.program_id FROM program WHERE program.uuid='de5d54ae-c304-11e8-9ad0-529269fb1459') AS program,MAX(encounter_datetime) AS date_enrolled,MAX(location_id),MAX(encounter.creator),NOW(),0,UUID() AS uuid FROM encounter INNER JOIN encounter_type ON(encounter_type.encounter_type_id=encounter.encounter_type) WHERE encounter_type.uuid='8d5b27bc-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f' GROUP BY patient_id;

changeSet.author: dbaluku
changeSet.comment: Setting modules to FHIR,Data Entry Statistics to be started manually
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'false' WHERE property IN ('fhir.started', 'dataentrystatistics.started');

changeSet.author: slubwama
changeSet.comment: Setting modules for Data Entry Statistics to be started automatically
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = 'true' WHERE property ='dataentrystatistics.started';

changeSet.author: slubwama
changeSet.comment: Changing Concept Name for concept 99610 from SMS care entry to SMC care entry Changing Concept Description to change SMS word to SMC Word

column.value: Closes all active facility visits that started before today.

changeSet.author: dbaluku
changeSet.comment: Migrate data from concept id 90253 (HIV Status) to 165275 (Family Member HIV Status) unknown answer 90001 to 165165 in the on the ART Summary Page Family Tracking Section from 2.x to 3.x
changeSet.sql: UPDATE obs SET concept_id = 165275 WHERE concept_id = 90253 and obs_group_id is not null; UPDATE obs SET value_coded=165165 WHERE concept_id = 165275 and value_coded=90001 and obs_group_id is not null;

changeSet.author: ssmusoke

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(program_workflow_state_id) FROM program_workflow_state WHERE uuid = 'ab6d1f1d-fcf6-4255-8b6f-2bf8959ad8f2';

changeSet.comment: Move all patients who have ever enrolled into care into the HIV program and set the state to UNKNOWN only after the state has been loaded
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO patient_program (patient_id, program_id, date_enrolled, location_id, creator, date_created, voided, uuid) SELECT patient_id,(SELECT program.program_id FROM program WHERE program.uuid='18c6d4aa-0a36-11e7-8dbb-507b9dc4c741') AS program,encounter_datetime AS date_enrolled,location_id,encounter.creator,NOW(),0,UUID() AS uuid FROM encounter INNER JOIN encounter_type ON(encounter_type.encounter_type_id=encounter.encounter_type) WHERE encounter_type.uuid='8d5b27bc-c2cc-11de-8d13-0010c6dffd0f' GROUP BY patient_id;
INSERT INTO patient_state(patient_program_id,state,start_date,creator,date_created,uuid) SELECT pp.patient_program_id, 11, pp.date_enrolled, 1, pp.date_enrolled, uuid() FROM patient_program pp, program p WHERE pp.program_id = p.program_id AND p.uuid = '18c6d4aa-0a36-11e7-8dbb-507b9dc4c741'

changeSet.author: slubwama

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = "ugandaemr.dhis2.organizationuuid" AND property_value="eg d06ace3e-9c46-11e7-abc4-cec278b6b50a"

changeSet.comment: Change the default value of the global property gandaemr.dhis2.organizationuuid from 'eg d06ace3e-9c46-11e7-abc4-cec278b6b50a' to an empty string
changeSet.sql: UPDATE global_property SET property_value = "" WHERE property = "ugandaemr.dhis2.organizationuuid" AND property_value="eg d06ace3e-9c46-11e7-abc4-cec278b6b50a"

changeSet.author: mmwanje
changeSet.comment: Changing Concept Name for concept 99302 from Fifty dose to Fifth dose
changeSet.sql: UPDATE concept_name SET name = 'Fifth dose' WHERE concept_id =99302 AND concept_name_type ='FULLY_SPECIFIED';

changeSet.author: dbaluku
changeSet.comment: Add observations of transfer in date and transfer out date for transfer in encounters and transfer out encounters respectively
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO obs (person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, obs_datetime, location_id,value_datetime, creator, date_created, voided, status,uuid) SELECT e.patient_id,99160,e.encounter_id,e.encounter_datetime,2,e.encounter_datetime,e.creator,e.date_created,0,'FINAL',uuid() FROM encounter e inner join encounter_type et on e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id WHERE et.uuid ='3e8354f7-31b3-4862-a52e-ff41a1ee60af' and e.voided =0; INSERT INTO obs (person_id, concept_id, encounter_id, obs_datetime, location_id,value_datetime, creator, date_created, voided, status,uuid) SELECT e.patient_id,99165,e.encounter_id,e.encounter_datetime,2,e.encounter_datetime,e.creator,e.date_created,0,'FINAL',uuid() FROM encounter e inner join encounter_type et on e.encounter_type = et.encounter_type_id WHERE et.uuid ='e305d98a-d6a2-45ba-ba2a-682b497ce27c' and e.voided =0;

changeSet.sql: DELETE FROM scheduler_task_config WHERE uuid = '415b8d70-6b45-41d8-a0ba-41b1a6b8aa1f';

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) from location WHERE uuid = '8f96e239-8586-4ec6-9375-04c6e19628ae';

changeSet.comment: Retire SMC Clinic
changeSet.sql: UPDATE location SET retired = 1 WHERE uuid = '8f96e239-8586-4ec6-9375-04c6e19628ae';

changeSet.author: dbaluku
changeSet.comment: Updating encounters and obs that were created with location_id set a null to ART Clinic location
changeSet.sql: UPDATE encounter SET location_id = (select location_id from location where uuid='86863db4-6101-4ecf-9a86-5e716d6504e4') WHERE location_id IS null; UPDATE obs SET location_id = (select location_id from location where uuid='86863db4-6101-4ecf-9a86-5e716d6504e4') WHERE location_id IS null;

changeSet.author: dbaluku
changeSet.comment: Insert Cohort type for SMS Cohort and SMS Cohorts

changeSet.author: slubwama
changeSet.comment: add test orders with results into the order_obs table
changeSet.sql: replace into order_obs (encounter_id, order_id, obs_id, date_created, creator, uuid) (select encounter_id, order_id, obs_id, date_created, creator, uuid() from obs where order_id is not null);

changeSet.author: iakileng
changeSet.comment: Updating family member's hiv unknown status concept id in obs table
changeSet.sql: UPDATE obs SET value_coded = 90001 where value_coded = 165165 and concept_id = 165275;

changeSet.author: semujju
changeSet.comment: Change htmlformentry_html_form table to UTF-8 encoding

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM concept_name WHERE concept_name_id> 7000000 limit 1;

changeSet.comment: Change concept names from a big number to a normal increment number

changeSet.comment: Insert Cohort type for Eligibility Cohort and eligible Cohorts
changeSet.sql:
REPLACE INTO cohort_type(name,date_created,creator,uuid)VALUES ('Eligibility Cohort Type','2024-02-28',1,'1345c89c-8463-41e9-9cd0-8c14aa255ba8');
REPLACE INTO cohort(name,description, date_created,creator,uuid,cohort_type_id)VALUES ('HIV Program','Eligible', '2024-02-28', 1, '56b082f8-f956-499d-a8c2-d9b32a067e65',(SELECT cohort_type_id from cohort_type where uuid='1345c89c-8463-41e9-9cd0-8c14aa255ba8')), ('TB Program','Eligible','2024-02-28',1,'0aa9ba5f-d44a-4b31-aff1-3a046bd8e5e0',(SELECT cohort_type_id from cohort_type where uuid='1345c89c-8463-41e9-9cd0-8c14aa255ba8')), ('MCH Program','Eligible', '2024-02-28', 1, 'd861187f-e25a-493b-81b1-b2a4c4679b7a',(SELECT cohort_type_id from cohort_type where uuid='1345c89c-8463-41e9-9cd0-8c14aa255ba8')), ('Nutrition Program','Eligible', '2024-02-28',1,'2827e1b5-be8a-4c1d-afc7-f6afcc4f2537',(SELECT cohort_type_id from cohort_type where uuid='1345c89c-8463-41e9-9cd0-8c14aa255ba8'));
